summary: The video promotes an airline pass offering four round-trip tickets to destinations like Tahiti, Paris, Auckland, and Tokyo in economy class. The pass is priced at $1,525, which is highlighted as a good deal compared to typical round-trip ticket prices of $750 each. However, there are restrictions: passengers must depart from LAX or Seattle, and only 250 passes are available. The pass goes on sale on November 25th at 9 a.m. Pacific Time, and viewers are encouraged to act quickly to secure their spot before bots purchase the limited availability. The pass is offered by Air Tahiti Nui, and the speaker asks viewers to share if they plan to buy the pass.
keywords: airline pass, round-trip tickets, Tahiti, Paris, Auckland, Tokyo, economy class, $1,525, $750, LAX, Seattle, 250 passes, November 25th, 9 a.m. Pacific Time, Air Tahiti Nui
creator_demographic: Age: Unknown, Gender: Unknown, Geographic Location: Unknown
